mapper.sql: FROM TBD_GRPHC_INFO TGI INNER JOIN TBD_GRPHC_CL TGC ON TGI.CL_ID = TGC.CL_ID INNER JOIN COMTNEMPLYRINFO CEI ON TGI.REGISTER_ID = CEI.EMPLYR_ID

WHERE (TGI.REGISTER_ID = #{registerId} OR PNRS_AT = 'Y') AND DELETE_AT != 'Y'
AND TGI.SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
AND CEI.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchWrd} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBD_GRPHC_INFO (GRPHC_ID, CL_ID, SJ, GEOJSON, PNRS_AT, DELETE_AT, REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_MODF_DT) VALUES (#{grphcId}, #{clId}, #{sj}, #{geojson}, #{pnrsAt}, 'N', #{registerId}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE TBD_GRPHC_INFO SET CL_ID = #{clId}, SJ = #{sj}, GEOJSON = #{geojson}, PNRS_AT = #{pnrsAt}, LAST_MODF_DT = now() WHERE GRPHC_ID = #{grphcId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBD_IMAGE_MKR (MKR_ID, MKR_NM, IMG, REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT) VALUES (#{mkrId}, #{mkrNm}, #{img}, #{registerId}, now())
